software.description: vIST/e is a C++ application that allows interactive visualization of various kinds of imaging datasets, both simple scalar data as well as complex high-dimensional data such as diffusion tensor imaging (DTI) and high angular resolution imaging data (HARDI). vIST/e is based on VTK, Qt and is designed as a plugin system which allows it to be extended in a flexible way. vIST/e is the main research tool of Imaging Science and Technology Eindhoven (IST/e), a major imaging group Eindhoven University of Technology, the Netherlands which brings together all university faculties involved in medical or industrial imaging.
